game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is plagued by a terrible curse that turns people into stone.
game.ending: The protagonist defeats the dark sorcerer and shatters the curse, restoring magic to the world.
game.synopsis: In a desperate bid to save their home, a young apprentice sets out on a perilous journey to uncover the secrets behind the mysterious curse. Along the way, they discover ancient ruins, forge unexpected alliances, and master forgotten spells in a quest to vanquish the darkness and revive the lost art of magic.
game.title: The Last Spell
